name: Glock Knight
description:
Would you go against your morals in order to save your planet? Become Glock Knight and Join the fight in stopping Artegon from destroying your planet in this classic style RPG!!

Up - Up Arrow / W  
Down - Down Arrow / S  
Left - Left Arrow / A  
Right - Right Arrow / D  
A - Alt / Z / J  
B - Ctrl / K / X  
Start - Enter  
Select - Shift  

Tools Used:

GB Studio | Open MPT | Piskel
